hero_subtitle_pt1: The power of a full-service marketing agency at a
service_other: All other channels that are relevant to your business
faq_q1: What marketing services do you offer?
faq_a1: I offer a comprehensive range of marketing services including social media management, content creation, SEO optimization, website maintenance, PPC campaigns, email marketing, and strategic planning tailored to your business needs.
faq_q2: How much does your marketing service cost?
faq_a2: My standard marketing package starts at {price} per month, which includes end-to-end execution and strategy. Custom packages are available based on your specific requirements and business size.
faq_q3: How long does it take to see results from marketing efforts?
faq_a3: Results vary depending on your industry, competition, and current market position. Typically, you can expect to see initial improvements within 1-2 months, with more significant results appearing after 3-6 months of consistent strategy implementation.
faq_q4: Do you work with businesses in specific industries?
faq_a4: I have experience working with businesses across various industries including Luxury, Fashion, SaaS, Tech, Fitness, Lifestyle, and Real Estate. My approach is adaptable to different market segments and business models.
faq_q5: What is your approach to social media marketing?
faq_a5: My approach to social media marketing involves creating a tailored strategy based on your target audience, developing engaging content, implementing consistent posting schedules, managing community engagement, and utilizing data analytics to continuously optimize performance.
faq_q6: How do you measure marketing success?
faq_a6: I measure success through various KPIs including website traffic, conversion rates, engagement metrics, lead generation, ROI, and ultimately, business growth. Regular reporting and analytics reviews ensure we track progress and adjust strategies as needed.

brand_badge_work: I worked across multiple digital marketing channels, including web design, SEO, content creation, PPC, and email marketing, to strengthen online presence and increase the number of trial sign-ups
brand_badger_cat: Senior Marketing Associate & Operations Lead, Badger Maps
brand_badger_review: When Giacomo gets involved in a project, you can instantly envision a fast outcome with the highest quality standards.
brand_gucci_work: Social media marketing and influencer collaborations.
brand_gucci_cat: EMEA Media Strategist, Guccio Gucci S.P.A.
brand_gucci_review: Giacomo’s excellent coordination with teams and partners has streamlined processes and delivered major successes, including a Burj Khalifa projection and metro campaigns across Europe.
brand_mikali_work: I developed a branding and marketing strategy for the upcoming luxury brand, including online and offline channels. If you are a luxury business owner, find out how my team and I can help at Luxury Method.
brand_mikali_review: Working with Giacomo is such a joy, experiencing his immense creativity in bring your luxury brand to life in a  way that surpasses all your expectations.
brand_badger_ceo_review: Giacomo Rotella did a fantastic job as a member of the Marketing team at Badger with his in-depth knowledge of content marketing, strategic messaging and branding.
brand_badger_ceo_work: Part of the Gucci Media team in 2023-2024, managing digital marketing initiatives.
brand_social_website_creation: Social media content creation and website development for property marketing.
brand_digital_strategy: Digital marketing strategy and brand positioning in competitive markets.
brand_seo_content: SEO strategy, content writing, and social media content development.
brand_event_promo: Event promotion, social media strategy, and content creation.
brand_dock_bay_work: I developed a global brand strategy for the eco-friendly quick-dry towels company, including a US market entry plan and marketing campaigns to build awareness and engagement with the target audience.
brand_jack_wills_work: I developed a digital marketing strategy for the British premium clothing brand, alongside a US market entry plan. My work focused on establishing a strong market presence to grow the brand’s audience.
brand_radiance_work: In addition to a 360° marketing strategy, we created and manage the website, custom CRM, and analytics dashboard of this premium clinic. We also manage the 15K+ followers' social media accounts.
brand_gucci_specific_work: In 2023–2024, I was part of Gucci’s EMEA media team, contributing to the brand’s omnichannel marketing strategy. If you are a luxury business owner, discover how my team and I can help at Luxury Method.
brand_kanan_work: My team and I supported Kanan through website optimization, Google Ads campaigns, content creation, and social media management, strengthening the brand’s digital presence and increasing conversions.
brand_kukreja_work: We designed and developed a modern website and created social media content for this luxury real estate developer, focusing on a visually striking and user-friendly experience across all channels.
brand_websitesetup_work: I drastically enhanced SEO performance through strategic keyword research and strategy, link building, and content writing. Several of the pages I created achieved first-page ranking on Google.
brand_lanes_work: I managed content creation, social media strategy, website design, and analytics for a newly established streetwear fashion brand, driving enhanced online visibility, audience engagement, and conversions.
brand_offbeat_work: We developed an integrated marketing strategy, including branding, web design, SEO content writing, social media, guerrilla marketing, and book marketing, and built a WhatsApp community from the ground up.
brand_ai_summit_work: My team and I worked on the design, development, and optimization of the website and custom CMS for this AI event. Our efforts ensured a cohesive visual identity and a seamless digital experience.
brand_risin_work: I provide continuous marketing support to a leading startup incubation, venture studio, and investment firm in the Middle East and India, as well as to its events, partners, and portfolio startups.
